channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on Ding Jianhui 的个人博客 - 笔记

item.title: Docker中安装Redis并设置安全选项
item.description: 官方文档 https://redis.io/ https://hub.docker.com/_/redis https://github.com/redis/redis 环境 CentOS 7 + docker + docker-compose + redis 5.0 以安装redis5.0.7为例,目前最新版是6.0.6 下载安装 redis redis:<version> redis:<version>-alpine 1 2 3 4 [tintin@localhost ~]$ docker pull redis:5.0.7-alpine [tintin@localhost ~]$ docker images REPOSITORY TAG IMAGE ID CREATED
